dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint from BigLion.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Wednesday, April 05, 2006 5:13 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; erik@biglion.com
Subject: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint from BigLion.com]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         Re: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint from BigLion.com
Date:         Wed, 05 Apr 2006 17:28:09 -0400
From:         erik@biglion.com
To:         legal-response@theplanet.com, legalresponse2@theplanet.com,
abuse@theplanet.com, copyright@theplanet.com
References:         <20060207230103.12F0C6CC4@orbit02.theplanet.com>



Dear Legal Response Team;

It has come to my attention that http://www.netshome.com is active again on
your server and is still a direct copy of my website. You have already been
informed of this fact and had disabled the site in February as the email
copied below shows. I am informing you that the infringing site is now live
again on your servers. I urge you to *IMMEDIATELY and
PERMANENTLY* remove this site from your server. They are still violating my
copyright and need to be permanently shut down.

Please respond and inform me of your immediate actions.

Sincerely,
Erik Vogel


- ----- Original Message -----
From: <legal-response@theplanet.com <mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com>>
To: <erik@biglion.com <mailto:erik@biglion.com>>;
<legalresponse2@theplanet.com <mailto:legalresponse2@theplanet.com>>
Sent: Tuesday, February 07, 2006 7:01 PM
Subject: DMCA Complaint from BigLion.com

> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.
>
> Legal Response Team
>
> The Planet
>
> ---------
>
>
> From: erik@biglion.com <mailto:erik@biglion.com>
[mailto:erik@biglion.com]
> Sent: Tuesday, January 31, 2006 8:53 AM
> To: copyright@theplanet.com <mailto:copyright@theplanet.com>;
abuse@theplanet.com <mailto:abuse@theplanet.com>;
legal-response@theplanet.com <mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com>
> Subject: DMCA Issue - Copyright Infringement
> Importance: High
>
> It has come to my attention that two websites hosted on your servers
are illegally using my copyrighted materials. Please shut the offending
sites down immediately. A copy of the following DMCA complaint form has been
attached for your records.
>
> Erik Vogel
> 47 Winslow Lane
> Smithtown, NY 11787
>
> January 31, 2006
>
> ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
> Attn: George Poletes, Corporate Counsel
> 1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
> Dallas, TX 75207
>
> Dear Mr. Poletes,
>
> Please remove the infringing content of http://www.netshome.com AND
http://www.bestupdate.com

> The copyrighted works at issue are the websites located at
http://www.biglion.com and http://www.onlinestoresmall.com and all their
internal pages.
>
> 1.                  Infringing Web Pages: The entire website at
http://www.netshome.com is a direct copy of my website
http://www.biglion.com and the entire website at http://www.bestupdate.com
is a copy of my former site at http://www.onlinestoresmall.com which has
since been closed.
>
> 2.                  My Contact Information: erik@biglion.com
<mailto:erik@biglion.com>
>
> 3.                  Infringer's Contact Information: (Taken from the
Whois)
>
> netshome.com
>
> Wisner, Janet info@netshome.com <mailto:info@netshome.com>
>
> 6500 Castlewood Dr. #601
>
> Carroll, Ohio 43112
>
>
>
> bestupdate.com
>
> Reeves, Melvin info@bestupdate.com <mailto:info@bestupdate.com>
>
> 2509 N. Campbell #276
>
> Tucson, AZ 85719
>
>
> 4.                  I have a good faith belief that use of the
copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages
is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
>
> 5.                  I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the
information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright
owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right
that is allegedly infringed.
>
>
> Sincerely,
> Erik Vogel, Partner
> BigLion.com
> Phone: 631-724-6475
>
>
>
> Email: erik@biglion.com <mailto:erik@biglion.com>
>
>

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFENEDkvK/XpJs6oyURAi9BAJ9DEhnBxTw7200NQ5/2zi+r6prTxgCggajX
gM1fbYllL7t3wKKwxz49B/g=
=XlfV
